Incorrect Usage. flag provided but not defined: -bla

NAME:
   renamedFlag - A new cli application

USAGE:
   renamedFlag [global options] command [command options] [arguments...]

COMMANDS:
   help, h  Shows a list of commands or help for one command

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --flag value  (default: 0)
   --help, -h    show help (default: false)
